problem.markdown:
>>Calculate the production rate of good products in bottle per sec. (Good products are the products which pass the inspection after the capping machine, round to 3 decimal places) <<
= 0.920 +-5%
>>If the capping speed is increased from 5400 bottles/hour to 6600 bottles/hour, what is the new production rate in bottles per sec? (round to 3 decimal places)<<
=0.920+-5%
problem.label: Calculate the production rate of good products in bottle per sec. (Good products are the products which pass the inspection after the capping machine, round to 3 decimal places)
If the capping speed is increased from 5400 bottles/hour to 6600 bottles/hour, what is the new production rate in bottles per sec? (round to 3 decimal places)
